argumentText:
ARGUMENT
i r s

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mplval.p | |- P = ( I mPoly R ) |
| 2 |  | mplval.s | |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 3 |  | mplval.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 4 |  | mplval.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 5 |  | mplval.u | |- U = { f e. B | f finSupp .0. } |
| 6 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( i mPwSer r ) e. _V |
| 7 | 6 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) -> ( i mPwSer r ) e. _V ) |
| 8 |  | #P_id | |- ( s = ( i mPwSer r ) -> s = ( i mPwSer r ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) -> ( i mPwSer r ) = ( I mPwSer R ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_sylan9eqr | |- ( ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) /\ s = ( i mPwSer r ) ) -> s = ( I mPwSer R ) ) |
| 11 | 10, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) /\ s = ( i mPwSer r ) ) -> s = S ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) /\ s = ( i mPwSer r ) ) -> ( Base ` s ) = ( Base ` S ) ) |
| 13 | 12, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) /\ s = ( i mPwSer r ) ) -> ( Base ` s ) = B ) |
| 14 |  | #P_simplr | |- ( ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) /\ s = ( i mPwSer r ) ) -> r = R ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) /\ s = ( i mPwSer r ) ) -> ( 0g ` r ) = ( 0g ` R ) ) |
| 16 | 15, 4 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) /\ s = ( i mPwSer r ) ) -> ( 0g ` r ) = .0. ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_breq2d | |- ( ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) /\ s = ( i mPwSer r ) ) -> ( f finSupp ( 0g ` r ) <-> f finSupp .0. ) ) |
| 18 | 13, 17 | #P_rabeqbidv | |- ( ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) /\ s = ( i mPwSer r ) ) -> { f e. ( Base ` s ) | f finSupp ( 0g ` r ) } = { f e. B | f finSupp .0. } ) |
| 19 | 18, 5 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) /\ s = ( i mPwSer r ) ) -> { f e. ( Base ` s ) | f finSupp ( 0g ` r ) } = U ) |
| 20 | 11, 19 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) /\ s = ( i mPwSer r ) ) -> ( s |`s { f e. ( Base ` s ) | f finSupp ( 0g ` r ) } ) = ( S |`s U ) ) |
| 21 | 7, 20 | #P_csbied | |- ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) -> [_ ( i mPwSer r ) / s ]_ ( s |`s { f e. ( Base ` s ) | f finSupp ( 0g ` r ) } ) = ( S |`s U ) ) |
| 22 |  | #P_df-mpl | |- mPoly = ( i e. _V , r e. _V |-> [_ ( i mPwSer r ) / s ]_ ( s |`s { f e. ( Base ` s ) | f finSupp ( 0g ` r ) } ) ) |
| 23 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( S |`s U ) e. _V |
| 24 | 21, 22, 23 | #P_ovmpt2a | |- ( ( I e. _V /\ R e. _V ) -> ( I mPoly R ) = ( S |`s U ) ) |
| 25 |  | #P_reldmmpl | |- Rel dom mPoly |
| 26 | 25 | #P_ovprc | |- ( -. ( I e. _V /\ R e. _V ) -> ( I mPoly R ) = (/) ) |
| 27 |  | #P_ress0 | |- ( (/) |`s U ) = (/) |
| 28 | 26, 27 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( -. ( I e. _V /\ R e. _V ) -> ( I mPoly R ) = ( (/) |`s U ) ) |
| 29 |  | #P_reldmpsr | |- Rel dom mPwSer |
| 30 | 29 | #P_ovprc | |- ( -. ( I e. _V /\ R e. _V ) -> ( I mPwSer R ) = (/) ) |
| 31 | 2, 30 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( -. ( I e. _V /\ R e. _V ) -> S = (/) ) |
| 32 | 31 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( -. ( I e. _V /\ R e. _V ) -> ( S |`s U ) = ( (/) |`s U ) ) |
| 33 | 28, 32 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( -. ( I e. _V /\ R e. _V ) -> ( I mPoly R ) = ( S |`s U ) ) |
| 34 | 24, 33 | #P_pm2.61i | |- ( I mPoly R ) = ( S |`s U ) |
| 35 | 1, 34 | #P_eqtri | |- P = ( S |`s U ) |
